subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mo Williams scored 24 points, LeBron James added 22 and the surging Cleveland Cavaliers rolled to their eighth straight win, a 102-96 victory at home over the Atlanta Hawks on Saturday. The loss snapped Atlanta’s seven-game winning streak. cavs.
snippet: Mo Williams scored 24 points, LeBron James added 22 and the surging Cleveland Cavaliers rolled to their eighth straight win, a 102-96 victory at home over the Atlanta Hawks on Saturday. The loss snapped Atlanta’s seven-game winning streak. cavs.
